name: libwebp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy
compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web
developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: giflib
dependencies.description:
The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been
pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: py-pillow-simd
dependent_to.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependent_to.name: gimp
dependent_to.description:
GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, macOS,
Windows and more operating systems. It is free software, you can change
its source code and distribute your changes. Whether you are a graphic
designer, photographer, illustrator, or scientist, GIMP provides you
with sophisticated tools to get your job done. You can further enhance
your productivity with GIMP thanks to many customization options and 3rd
party plugins.

dependent_to.name: leptonica
dependent_to.description:
Leptonica is an open source library containing software that is broadly
useful for image processing and image analysis applications.

dependent_to.name: py-imagecodecs
dependent_to.description:
Imagecodecs is a Python library that provides block-oriented, in-memory
buffer transformation, compression, and decompression functions for use
in the tifffile, czifile, zarr, and other scientific image input/output
modules..

dependent_to.name: opencv
dependent_to.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependent_to.name: py-pillow
dependent_to.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.

dependent_to.name: gdal
dependent_to.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.

dependent_to.name: libtiff
dependent_to.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependent_to.name: mapnik
dependent_to.description:
mapnik combines pixel-perfect image output with lightning-fast
cartographic algorithms, and exposes interfaces in C++, Python, and Node
